Title: Kiss
Plot: While working on the film class's movies, team player Dawson has a hard time being stuck in the background. Meanwhile as he plots to give Jen the "perfect kiss", Joey is swept away by a handsome stranger and Pacey tries to graduate to manhood.
ParentalRatingReason: PG Violence, coarse language and sexual references
GuestStars: Nicole Nieth, Obi Ndefo, Scott Foley, Ian Bohen, Leann Hunley, Mitchell Laurance, Angela Ray, Christopher Berry, Chris Blackwelder, Patrick Tucker, Jeremy D. Shepherd
